title: Onozomi No Mama Ni
alternative_title: お望みのままに ; A Season For Three ; The Imitation Lovers ; As you wish! (German)
status: お望みのままに ; A Season For Three ; The Imitation Lovers ; As you wish! (German)
description:
Description :
        A collection of short stories: 1) Onozomi no Mama ni Kaname has inherited an apartment for an elite from his rich but now deceased grandfather. The apartment comes along with a handsome butler, Hidaka . But there are influential people who want to separate them. 2,3,4) A Season For Three 5) The Imitation Lovers - "Would you be my pretend lover?" This unexpected question is posed to the person who has a one-sided love for the inquirer. - From Sweet Lunacy 6) Onozomi no Mama ni extra

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4 : A Season For Three
Vol.1 Chapter 2 : Ch.2-3: A Season For Three
